name: Name
heroHeading: Find Government Schemes You're Eligible For
heroSubheading: Personalized government scheme suggestions in seconds
feature1Desc: Match your profile to the most relevant government schemes
feature2Desc: Hundreds of verified central and state welfare programs
feature3Desc: View scheme details in your regional language for clarity
feature4Desc: Instantly know which schemes you qualify for, no paperwork required
howSubtext: Our AI system helps you find matching schemes in just 3 simple steps.
step1Desc: Provide information about income, region, education...
step2Desc: We check your profile with 500+ government schemes.
step3Desc: You get a list of matched schemes instantly in your language
footerTagline: Connecting citizens to the schemes they deserve.
aboutIntro: SchemeSeeker is a platform that helps Indian citizens discover government welfare schemes they may be eligible for — quickly, simply, and in one place.
whyDesc: Many people miss out on valuable government schemes due to lack of awareness or access. Our mission is to close that gap using smart technology and accessibility.
whoAnyone: Anyone who wants to access benefits they qualify for
howDesc: You simply enter your basic details — age, income, region, and occupation — and our platform shows you possible schemes you may be eligible for.
